message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to sell it to you for just $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find another offer like this anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take it?
I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality. It's too much of a risk for me.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I'd like to offer you a guarantee that this product is... not entirely useless. Okay, fine, it's not even close to being useful. But think of it as a unique conversation starter or a fun party trick! And at $10000, it's a steal! You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, I promise. So, what do you say? Are you in?
I'm not interested in a product that's not even useful, let alone worth $10000 to me. I'll pass.

Ahah, I knew you'd come around eventually! This one's a real gem, Bob. I'm not just saying that because it's a high-quality product, but because I think it's actually worth more than the asking price. But I'm a reasonable person, so I'm willing to sell it to you for the low, low price of $10000. You won't regret it, I promise. It's a game-changer. What do you say? Will you take the plunge?
I'll take it, but only because I'm hoping it's the high-quality product. I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, but I'll give it a shot.

Ha! I knew you'd see things my way, Bob! And you won't regret it, I promise. This one's a real doozy. In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'll give you an exclusive deal. If you buy it, I'll throw in a special bonus that's worth an additional $2500. It's a one-time offer, so you have to act fast. Are you ready to take your business to the next level with this incredible product?
I'm not interested in the bonus, and I'm not going to pay $10000 for a product that's already worth $12500 to me. I'll pass.

Ah, come on Bob! You're not going to let a little thing like value stop you from making a great deal, are you? This product may not be worth $12500, but it's still a fantastic opportunity to get something for a steal. And who knows, you might be able to find a use for it someday. Plus, think of all the money you'll save by not buying something truly valuable. It's all about perspective, Bob. So, what do you say? Will you take a chance on this... unique product?
I'm not going to pay $10000 for something that's worth $0 to me. I'll pass.
